table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main PhotoObj table for the 2DF catalog
table.remarks: The main PhotoObj table for the 2DF catalog

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: unique object identifier, SEQNUM in original catalog

column.name: [cat]
column.summary: Catalogue Type: n for NGP,s for SGP and r for random fiels

column.name: [bjsel]
column.summary: Final bj magnitude with extinction correction

column.name: [orient]
column.summary: Orientation measured in degrees clockwise from E to W

column.name: [bjg]
column.summary: Final bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [pmag]
column.summary: Unmatched raw APM profile integrated mag

column.name: [fmag]
column.summary: Unmatched raw APM 2" profile integrated mag

column.name: [bjg_old]
column.summary: Original bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [bjselold]
column.summary: Original bj magnitude with extinction correction

column.name: [bjg_100]
column.summary: 100k release bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [bjsel100]
column.summary: 100k release bj magnitude with extinction correction

table.name: [dbo].[SpecObj]
table.summary: The main SpecObj table for the 2DF catalog
table.remarks: The main SpecObj table for the 2DF catalog

column.name: [objID]
column.summary: unique object identifier, SEQNUM in original catalog

column.name: [cat]
column.summary: Catalogue Type: n for NGP,s for SGP and r for random fiels

column.name: [bjg]
column.summary: Final bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [bjsel]
column.summary: Final bj magnitude with extinction correction

column.name: [bjg_old]
column.summary: Original bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [bjselold]
column.summary: Original bj magnitude with extinction correction

column.name: [sb_bj]
column.summary: SuperCosmos bj magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [sr_r]
column.summary: SuperCosmos R magnitude without extinction correction

column.name: [quality]
column.summary: Redshift quality parameter for best spectrum; reliable redshifts have >=3

column.name: [r_crcor]
column.summary: Cross-correlation R value from best spectrum

column.name: [nmbest]
column.summary: Number of emission lines for Z_EMI from best spectrum

column.name: [snr]
column.summary: Median S/N per pixel from best spectrum

column.name: [eta_type]
column.summary: Eta spectral type parameter from best spectrum (-99.9 if none)
